mapper.insert: insert into fabric_used_tb (fau_id, fabric_id, used_length, used_time, order_id) values (#{fauId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fabricId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usedLength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{usedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
